com.twitter.heron.scheduler.dryrun

Class FormatterUtils.Cell

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.twitter.heron.scheduler.dryrun.FormatterUtils.Cell
  • Enclosing class:
    FormatterUtils

    public static class FormatterUtils.Cell
extends java.lang.Object
    Cell is the smallest unit in a tabulate. More generally, it is a class that represents a piece of text with style and color added.
